00019 #ifndef SP_GRID_SG_H
00020 #define SP_GRID_SG_H
00021 
00022 #include "SpGlHeaders.h"
00023 #include "SpStreamGeometry.h"
00024 
00025 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027 namespace Spark
00028 {
00029 
00030 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 class SpGridSg : public SpStreamGeometry
00034 {
00035 
00037 public:
00038 
00039     SpGridSg(
00040         int iRows=10, int iCols=10,
00041         float fMinX = -1.0f, float fMinY = -1.0f,
00042         float fMaxX = 1.0f, float fMaxY = 1.0f, float fZ=0.5f)
00043     :
00044         m_iRows(iRows), m_iCols(iCols),
00045         m_fMinX(fMinX), m_fMinY(fMinY),
00046         m_fMaxX(fMaxX), m_fMaxY(fMaxY), m_fZ(fZ)
00047     {
00048         // EMPTY!
00049     }
00050 
00051     virtual ~SpGridSg()
00052     {
00053         // EMPTY!
00054     }
00055 
00057 public:
00058 
00059     virtual void render()
00060     {
00061         float fWidth = m_fMaxX - m_fMinX;
00062         float fHeight = m_fMaxY - m_fMinY;
00063 
00064         float fCenterX = (fWidth / 2.0f) + m_fMinX;
00065         float fCenterY = (fHeight / 2.0f) + m_fMinX;
00066 
00067         float fDW = fWidth / m_iCols;
00068         float fDH = fHeight / m_iRows;
00069 
00070         // just use a single normal direction
00071         // for the entire grid
00072         glNormal3f(fCenterX, fCenterY, 1.0);
00073         for (float fY = m_fMinY; fY < m_fMaxY; fY += fDH)
00074         {
00075             glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
00076             for (float fX = m_fMinX; fX < m_fMaxX; fX += fDW)
00077             {
00078                 glVertex3f(fX, fY, m_fZ);
00079                 glVertex3f(fX, fY + fDH, m_fZ);
00080             }
00081             glEnd();
00082         }
00083     }
00084 
00085     inline void setResolution(
00086         int iRows, int iCols)
00087     {
00088         m_iRows = iRows;
00089         m_iCols = iCols;
00090     }
00091 
00092 
00093     inline void setVertexCoordRect(
00094         float fMinX, float fMinY,
00095         float fMaxX, float fMaxY, float fZ = 0.5f)
00096     {
00097         m_fMinX = fMinX; m_fMaxX = fMaxX;
00098         m_fMinY = fMinY; m_fMaxY = fMaxY;
00099         m_fZ = fZ;
00100     }
00101 
00102 
00104 protected:
00105 
00106     int m_iRows;
00107     int m_iCols;
00108 
00109     float m_fMinX;
00110     float m_fMinY;
00111     float m_fMaxX;
00112     float m_fMaxY;
00113 
00114     float m_fZ;
00115 
00116 };
00117 
00118 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 
00120 }   // end namespace: Spark
00121 
00122 #endif
